page.title: 08SUPERNATURAL
page.content: Several people were interviewed and there is a strong belief that an old railway cottage is being haunted by a ghost ; also the local rectory which has since been demolished, boasts of having had a ghost. A poltergeist still exists in a house in New Houghton, objects have mysteriously moved around a room according to reports by the householder and she believes the previous occupant,since deceased, an old man is responsible for these strange happenings.One person was so supersticious that she carried three lucky charms - a silver horseshoe, a card with a fish which had the word spelled Jesus and a pen knife which her son gave to her. The charm with the fish had been given to her by an old lady who was convinced that the miraculous cure of her very sick husband was due to the charm.
